mod_epicloot_magicarrow_desc: Bow can form a magic arrow using eitr
mod_epicloot_magicbolt_desc: Crossbow can form a magic bolt using eitr
mod_epicloot_seasonality_desc: Summer never gets cold; spring increases harvest, chance to take effect <color=yellow>X</color>%; fall reduces fall damage by <color=yellow>X</color>%; winter never gets wet
mod_epicloot_modifyadrenalinecost_desc: Reduce required adrenaline needed to trigger by -<color=yellow>X</color>%
mod_epicloot_seawolf_desc: Total damage increased by <color=yellow>X</color>% while it is raining
mod_epicloot_ironmaiden_desc: If total incurred damage is over 25% of max health, gain <color=yellow>X</color> bonus armor
mod_epicloot_rejuvenate_desc: <color=yellow>X</color>% chance to heal 15% of total damage dealt over 12 seconds
mod_epicloot_lifebloom_desc: <color=yellow>X</color>% chance to heal 15% of incoming damage over 12 seconds
mod_epicloot_forsakenblow_desc: Reduce guardian power cooldown by <color=yellow>X</color> seconds per attack blocked
mod_epicloot_wayfarer_desc: Wayfarer [Activated]: Increases carry weight and removes movement speed penalties for 5min. Cooldown 10min
mod_epicloot_wayfarer_helm_desc: The wayfarer lights the way for his fellow vikings
mod_epicloot_wayfarer_chest_desc: The wayfarer is nimble and light on their toes
mod_epicloot_wayfarer_legs_desc: The wayfarer explores everything and anything
mod_epicloot_wayfarer_cape_desc: The wayfarer knows of all breezes and gusts
mod_epicloot_arrowrain: Hrafnstorm [Triggered]: Your arrow tears the sky, calling down a volley of spectral arrows.
mod_epicloot_arrowrain_desc: On impact, your shot summons a brief storm—raining poisoned arrows upon nearby foes.
mod_epicloot_hunterset_desc: A legendary hunter’s garb said to carry the blessing of Odin’s ravens, calling storms with every strike.
mod_epicloot_hunterchest_desc: Woven with raven-feather runes, it steadies the arm and sharpens the hunt.
mod_epicloot_hunterlegs_desc: Light as a raven’s glide, crafted for swift steps and deadlier aim.
mod_epicloot_huntercape_desc: A cloak of dark plumage—rumored to shift with the wind and hide its wearer from sight.
mod_epicloot_hunterhelmet_desc: A helm adorned with storm-black feathers, granting the focus of a hunting raven.
mod_epicloot_ulfheonar_desc: Ulfhéðnar [Activated]: Unleash a wolf-spirit roar. Allies and self enter a Frenzy state, greatly increasing movement speed and damage, but lowering resistances for 5 minutes. Cooldown: 10 minutes.
mod_epicloot_ulfheonar_helm_desc: A helm fashioned from the skull of a primordial direwolf. Its empty eyes still remember the hunt. Increases critical strike chance and grants bonus damage when wounded.
mod_epicloot_ulfheonar_cape_desc: A mantle draped in heavy wolf fur and etched bone runes. The air bends around it with a faint growl. Improves stealth and slightly slows enemies that draw near.
mod_epicloot_ulfheonar_legs_desc: Greaves wrapped in ancient pelts, reinforced with iron and bone. The wearer’s stride becomes swift and relentless. Increases movement speed and dodge distance.
mod_epicloot_ulfheonar_claws_desc: Gauntlets lined with iron claws and bound with wolf hide. Each strike tears deeper than the last. Boosts attack speed and unarmed damage; first hit applies a brief bleed.
mod_epicloot_siedrweaver_desc: Siedrweaver [Activated]: Channel ancient siedr to release a wave of restorative magic. Consumes Eitr to heal yourself and nearby allies
mod_epicloot_siedrweaver_helm_desc: A hood traced with quiet runes. It sharpens focus and steadies the flow of siedr.
mod_epicloot_siedrweaver_chest_desc: Robes embroidered with the threads of fate. They warm the spirit and bolster restorative magic.
mod_epicloot_siedrweaver_legs_desc: Woven legwraps blessed by spiritcallers, allowing the caster to move gracefully between worlds.
mod_epicloot_siedrweaver_cape_desc: A mantle shimmering with spirit-mist. The air around it feels lighter, as if touched by hidden hands.
